prompt.name: Search for a Specific Health Condition
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User clicks the search icon, searches for a specific health condition, and verifies that the search results page is displayed.

input.action: 'Click on the search icon', 'Type `Diabetes` into the search input field', 'Click the search button'

expected.outcome: The search results page for 'Diabetes' is displayed, showing relevant articles and publications.

prompt.name: Navigate to a Health Topic via A-Z List
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Health Topics' section, uses the A-Z list to find and access the information page for 'Tuberculosis'.

input.action: 'Click on the `Health Topics` link in the main navigation menu', 'Click on the `Health topics A-Z` link', 'Click on the letter `T` in the alphabetical index', 'Click on the `Tuberculosis` link'

expected.outcome: The main fact sheet for 'Tuberculosis' is displayed, with 'Tuberculosis' in the page title.

prompt.name: Find a Specific Country's Profile Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Countries' section and selects a specific country to view its health profile page.

input.action: 'Click on the `Countries` link in the main navigation menu', 'Click All Countries', 'Type `Japan` on the country filter field', 'Click on the `Japan` link'

expected.outcome: The country profile page for 'Japan' is displayed, showing the country's name as the main heading.

prompt.name: Find the Latest World Malaria Report
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds a specific annual report by first searching for the relevant WHO programme, navigating to their page, accessing the reports section, and opening the correct document.

input.action: 'Click the search icon', 'Type `Global Malaria Programme` into the search bar and submit the search', 'Click the search result link titled `Global Malaria Programme`', 'On the programme page, Click the All Publications Page', 'Click on the `Mekong Malaria Elimination Programme epidemiology summary, volume 29, January–March 2025`

expected.outcome: The landing page for the 'Mekong Malaria Elimination Programme epidemiology summary, volume 29, January–March 2025' is successfully displayed, providing links to the full report and its key findings.

prompt.name: Find a Specific News Release Using Filters
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Newsroom', selects 'News releases', and applies multiple filters (Year and Topic) to find a specific press release from 2023 concerning the COVID-19 pandemic.

input.search_input: Statement on the fifteenth meeting of the IHR (2005) Emergency Committee on the COVID-19 pandemic
input.action: 'Click on `Newsroom` in the main menu', 'Click on `News releases` from the dropdown', 'In the left filter panel, under `Year`, click `2023`', 'Wait for the results to update', 'In the left filter panel, under `Topic`, click `Coronavirus disease (COVID-19)`', 'Wait for the results to update', 'Find and click on the news release titled `Statement on the fifteenth meeting of the IHR (2005) Emergency Committee on the COVID-19 pandemic`'

expected.outcome: The specific news release from May 5, 2023, is displayed, confirming the filter functionality and navigation workflow.

prompt.name: Investigate a Specific Disease Outbreak Report
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Emergencies' section, then to 'Disease Outbreak News', and filters by year and disease to find a specific report on an Mpox outbreak.

input.search_input: Mpox (Monkeypox) - Democratic Republic of the Congo
input.action: 'Click on `Emergencies` in the main menu', 'Click on `Disease Outbreak News` from the dropdown', 'In the From Field input `2023`', 'Wait for the results to update', 'In the Search by Keyword, input `Mpox (monkeypox)`', 'Wait for the results to update', 'Find and click the report titled `Mpox (Monkeypox) - Democratic Republic of the Congo`'

expected.outcome: The specific Disease Outbreak News report for Mpox in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, published in 2023, is successfully located and displayed.

prompt.name: Search for COVID-19
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for COVID‑19 and verifies search results heading.

input.action: 'Click on the search icon', 'Type `COVID‑19` into the search input field', 'Click search button'

prompt.name: Navigate via A-Z to Malaria
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds 'Malaria' from Health Topics A‑Z.

input.action: 'Click Health Topics', 'Click Health topics A‑Z', 'Click letter M', 'Select Malaria link'

prompt.name: Open About WHO
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User accesses the About WHO section.

input.action: 'Click About WHO in main navigation', 'Click `Who we are` in the menu'

prompt.name: Switch site language
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User changes site language and confirms change.

input.action: 'Click the language selector (e.g. English)', 'Choose `Français`'

prompt.name: Open Countries page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Countries' listing.

input.action: 'Click Countries in nav menu', 'Click `All Countries`

expected.outcome: Countries page with filter is displayed.

prompt.name: Locate Japan profile
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User filters countries and opens Japan.

input.action: 'Click Countries', 'Click All Countries', 'Type Japan in country filter', 'Click Japan result'

prompt.name: Visit Publications
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens the Publications listing.

input.action: 'Click Health Topics', 'Click on Publications'

prompt.name: Search publication PDF
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User downloads a PDF from Publications.

input.action: 'Click Health Topics', 'Click Publications', 'Click `All`', 'Search for 'World Malaria Report 2024'', 'Click 'World Malaria Report 2024''

expected.outcome: The description page of 'World Malaria Report 2024' is shown successfully.

prompt.name: Explore Data & stats
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User visits data dashboard.

input.action: 'Click Data', 'Click `Data Hub`'

prompt.name: Access Newsletter
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User views the Newsletter.

input.action: 'Scroll to footer', 'Click Newsletter'

prompt.name: View Disease Outbreak News
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens Emergencies menu.

input.action: 'Click Emergencies in nav', 'Click Disease Outbreak News'

prompt.name: Navigate Cholera Emergencies
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens Emergencies menu and goes to Cholera Upsurge page

input.action: 'Click Emergencies in nav', 'Click Cholera'

prompt.name: Load Newsroom
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to Newsroom.

input.action: 'Click Newsroom in nav', 'Click `All news`'

prompt.name: Filter News by Year
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User filters news by year.

input.action: 'Click Newsroom in nav', 'Click `News Releases`', 'Under Year filter click `2025`'

prompt.name: Locate FAQ page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens the frequently asked questions page.

input.action: 'Scroll to footer', 'Click Frequently asked questions'

prompt.name: Open Careers page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User visits Careers.

input.action: 'Click Careers in footer'

prompt.name: Check Ethics
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User accesses Ethics information.

input.action: 'Scroll to footer', 'Click Ethics'

prompt.name: Find 2024 World Health Statistics Report
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for the latest World Health Statistics report, filters results by year, and downloads the PDF.

action: Type `World Health Statistics 2024` into the search input field
In search results, click the result titled 'World Health Statistics 2024'
On the report page, click the 'Download' button

expected.outcome: The user successfully locates and begins downloading the 2024 World Health Statistics report PDF.

prompt.name: Locate COVID-19 Press Release Using Filters
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to Newsroom, applies Year and Topic filters to find a specific COVID‑19 press release, and verifies page.

action: Click on `Newsroom` in the main menu
In the Topic filter, input`Coronavirus disease (COVID-19)`
In the Topic filter, select`Coronavirus disease (COVID-19)`
Wait for the results to update
Locate and click the release titled `WHO recommends against the use of convalescent plasma to treat COVID-19`

expected.outcome: The specified COVID‑19 press release from 2021 is displayed with correct heading and date.

prompt.name: Retrieve Mpox Outbreak Update from 2024
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User filters Disease Outbreak News by year and keyword to find Mpox update and verifies the page.

action: Click on `Emergencies` in the main menu
In the From Year filter, input `2024`
In the keyword filter, type `Mpox - South Africa`
Click on the report titled `Mpox - South Africa`

expected.outcome: The Mpox outbreak report in South Africa from 2024 is located and loaded correctly.

prompt.name: View Selected News from Bangladesh Country Profile
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Bangladesh country profile, and views a Bangladesh Specific Trending News

action: Click on `Countries` in the main navigation
On the Bangladesh page, click the `Bangladesh achieves historic milestone by eliminating kala-azar as a public health problem` link in News

expected.outcome: Bangladesh achieves historic milestone by eliminating kala-azar as a public health problem news page is successfully displayed.

prompt.name: Search and view a Data Set
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User locates the Global Health Observatory dataset, exports CSV, and verifies the file.

input.search_input: Global Health Observatory life expectancy dataset
action: Use the search or filter to locate `Life expectancy` dataset
Select the dataset Life expectancy at birth (years) under World Health Statistics

expected.outcome: User successfully views the selected GHO dataset.

prompt.name: Explore Maternal Mortality Ratio Indicator and Export Data
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.who.int/home and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User locates the maternal mortality ratio indicator in the data portal, filters by country/year, downloads data.

action: Type `maternal mortality ratio` in the indicator search box
Select the Maternal mortality ratio (per 100 000 live births)s under World Health Statistics
Click `Apply` and wait for table or chart to render

expected.outcome: Filtered maternal mortality ratio data is successfully found.
